title: [Question]: Ernie-layout support for multi-answers VQA finetuning
body:
### 请提出你的问题

Hi there, 
I have another question here, regrading the VQA dataset, seems now for each question, we only have one answer, for example: {"text": xxx, "answer_start": [2], "answer_end":[5]}, which the answer is a consective span from the text, so Im wondering if we support questions with answers which is not consective, e.g. multi-span VQA ??

For example, given a OCR result is ["This", "is", "a", "dummy", "test", "with", "right", "answer", "A1", "and", "A1", "has"....(some more words here)..,"another", "right", "answer", "A2",.....], so in this case, for the question: `What are the right answers` ?, the answer should be `A1` and `A2`, however, `A1` and `A2` are not next to each other, then how should we specify these kinda answer for the training ? Thanks for the help

title: Upgrade pre-commit to use isort, black, flake8 instead of yapf
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
Function optimization
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->

### PR changes
Others
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->

### Description
- 这次主要是用isort, black, flake8这三个工具替换掉yapf. 这个三件套是开源社区里最常见的python代码风格组合，完成这个转换后，我们的代码风格将和hf/transformers还有paddle框架基本一致
- 新的工具标准会更严格. 虽然自动化修改可以解决90%以上的issue, 仍然会有一些风格问题需要同学们手动修改. 这些问题不涉及代码逻辑，一般修改起来都很简单
- 合入以后，CI仅会在git diff(而不是全量代码)上跑来执行这几个工具. 在一段时间以后, 我们的全量代码就会被全部覆盖

title: [Question]:
body:
### 请提出你的问题

How to encode a "single word" as a single token after tokenizer's encoding? And even more, I need to inject some words linked by some symbol as a "single token"...

If not, the following issue would raise
```python
    # Convert the initializer_token, placeholder_token to ids
    token_ids = tokenizer.encode(args.initializer_token,
                                 add_special_tokens=False)["input_ids"]
    # Check if initializer_token is a single token or a sequence of tokens
    if len(token_ids) > 1:
        raise ValueError("The initializer token must be a single token.")
```
ref: [token_ids = tokenizer.encode(args.initializer_token,](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/blob/14e6813c1e6aa8db170cf6932242230152471363/ppdiffusers/examples/textual_inversion/train_textual_inversion.py#L482)

The init token might be split into multiple tokens by mistake, e.g. [bookcase] -> [book, case] -> [2828, 2068], which we suppose to be a single token [bookcase] -> [ $some_id ].

I've tried: 
1. "bookcase" -> [book, case] -> [2828, 2068]
2. "book-case" -> [book, -, case] -> [1116, 268, 2068]
3. "[bookcase]" -> ['[', book, case, ']'] -> [314, 2828, 2068, 316]

title: [PPDiffusers] add text2video
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Models

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
ppdiffusers新增text-to-video（VideoDiffusion）模型和推理。
VideoDiffusion采用UNet3DModel作为扩散模型主体，其核心结构是space-only 3D卷积残差块、时间注意块、空间注意块，采用AutoencoderKLVid作为潜在表示空间压缩的自编码模型，采用Bert作为文本编码模型。

推理脚本如下：
```python
import numpy as np
import os
from PIL import Image
import paddle
from ppdiffusers import VideoDiffusionPipeline

# 加载模型和scheduler
pipe = VideoDiffusionPipeline.from_pretrained("video-diffusion-paddle")

# 执行pipeline进行推理
prompt = "aerial vire of lake and barren mountains"
STD = paddle.to_tensor(np.load("assets/STD.npy"))* 3.
MEAN = paddle.to_tensor(np.load("assets/MEAN.npy"))
frames = pipe(prompt, num_frames = 8, num_inference_steps=100, std= STD, mean=MEAN, seed=6).videos

# 保存视频为gif格式
outdir='./outputs_mountain'
vid_cnt = 0
prompt = prompt.replace(' ','-')
for idx in range(len(frames)):
    videos = frames[idx]
    savepath = outdir+'/batch'+str(vid_cnt).zfill(7)+'/'
    os.makedirs(savepath, exist_ok=True)
    for fidx in range(len(videos)):
        frame = videos[fidx][0]
        frame.save(savepath + str(fidx).zfill(7)+ '.png')
    comm = 'ffmpeg -r 10 -i ' + savepath + '/%07d.png ' + ' -vf "split[s0][s1];[s0]palettegen[p];[s1][p]paletteuse" -y ' +outdir+ '/batch_'+ str(vid_cnt).zfill(7) + '_' + prompt+'.gif'
    os.system(comm)
    vid_cnt+=1
```

推理效果如下：
![batch_0000000_aerial-vire-of-lake-and-barren-mountains](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20476674/203891547-8124ef4b-97c9-4f16-8e47-1d922cd13f80.gif)

title: [Bug]: fast_tokenizer遇到GLIBCXX_3.4.20 not found 问题
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
与Paddle环境无关，仅使用fast_tokenizer
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
跑fast_tokenizer README，遇到如下报错：
[root@bfd2b0147273 work]# python test.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test.py", line 1, in <module>
    import fast_tokenizer
  File "/opt/rh/rh-python38/root/usr/local/lib64/python3.8/site-packages/fast_tokenizer/__init__.py", line 21, in <module>
    from . import core_tokenizers as C
ImportError: /lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found (required by /opt/rh/rh-python38/root/usr/local/lib64/python3.8/site-packages/fast_tokenizer/core_tokenizers.so)

本地gcc版本9.3.1，满足编译文档中gcc版本要求。
求问如何在不动环境的条件下解决？尝试基于repo安装whl包：pip install git+https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP.git@v2.4.3#subdirectory=fast_tokenizer ，但貌似只跑了setup.py没有跑C++编译部分
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

pip install fast-tokenizer-python==1.0.0 -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple
执行README中的代码
```
import fast_tokenizer
from fast_tokenizer import ErnieFastTokenizer, models

# 0.（可选）设置线程数
fast_tokenizer.set_thread_num(1)
# 1. 加载词表
vocab = models.WordPiece.read_file("ernie_vocab.txt")
# 2. 实例化ErnieFastTokenizer对象
fast_tokenizer = ErnieFastTokenizer(vocab)
# 3. 切词
output = fast_tokenizer.encode("我爱中国")
# 4. 输出结果
print("ids: ", output.ids)
print("type_ids: ", output.type_ids)
print("tokens: ", output.tokens)
print("offsets: ", output.offsets)
print("attention_mask: ", output.attention_mask)
```

title: [Bug] question_generation: error: unrecognized arguments: --ignore_pad_token_for_loss=True
body:
### 软件环境

```Markdown
- paddlepaddle-gpu: 2.3.2
- paddlenlp: 2.4.2
```


### 重复问题

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### 错误描述

```Markdown
error: unrecognized arguments: --ignore_pad_token_for_loss=True
```


### 稳定复现步骤 & 代码

`train.py`和`predict.py`不支持`--ignore_pad_token_for_loss=True`，但是代码里用到了改参数

```python
trans_func = partial(
    convert_example,
    tokenizer=tokenizer,
    decoder_start_token_id=model.t5.bos_token_id,
    max_source_length=args.max_source_length,
    max_target_length=args.max_target_length,
    ignore_pad_token_for_loss=args.ignore_pad_token_for_loss)
```

复现如下：
```zsh
cd ./examples/question_generation/t5
unset CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES   
python -m paddle.distributed.launch --gpus 1,2 train.py \
    --model_name_or_path=t5-base \
    --dataset_name=squad \
    --output_dir=output \
    --max_source_length=1024 \
    --max_target_length=142 \
    --learning_rate=1e-4 \
    --num_train_epochs=2 \
    --logging_steps=100 \
    --save_steps=1000 \
    --seed=42 \
    --train_batch_size=2 \
    --eval_batch_size=8 \
    --warmup_proportion=0.1 \
    --ignore_pad_token_for_loss=True \
    --device=gpu
```
或者
```zsh
cd ./examples/question_generation/t5
export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0
python predict.py \
    --model_name_or_path=./checkpoints/model_xx/ \
    --dataset_name=squad \
    --output_path=generate.txt \
    --max_source_length=1024 \
    --max_target_length=142 \
    --decode_strategy=greedy_search \
    --top_k=2 \
    --top_p=1.0 \
    --num_beams=1 \
    --length_penalty=0.0 \
    --batch_size=64 \
    --seed=42 \
    --ignore_pad_token_for_loss=True \
    --logging_steps=100 \
    --device=gpu
```

title: [Question]: how to change the keyword 'sks' as it would pollute data
body:
### 请提出你的问题

lab: ppdiffusers, dreambooth
The 'sks' is the fixed point in dreambooth, we may use the sentence "a photo of sks {keyword}" for models' fine tuning, but the 'sks' is also know of a kind of semi-automatic rifle ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SKS, our results might be polluted by the images of gun, and with the increasing of epochs, the result would be more probable generated as some kinds of wired machine gun instead of what we pointed

So, how can I change the keyword 'sks' in ppdiffusers to avoid this pollution? ref: https://github.com/XavierXiao/Dreambooth-Stable-Diffusion/blob/main/ldm/data/personalized.py#L10

```bash
git clone https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP.git
```
